duties_responsibilities.duty: Process teller transactions, open new membership accounts, complete consumer loan applications, and provide general account information.
Identify members' financial needs and offer appropriate products and services.
Cross-sell and up-sell credit union products and services to meet identified needs and maximize retention.
Provide exemplary member experience and ensure transactions are processed accurately and professionally.
Establish value-added relationships with members and offer tailored solutions for their financial needs.
Process financial transactions including deposits, payments, cashing checks, transfers, loan advances, counting coins, wire transfers, and redeeming bonds.
Open and maintain accounts, including share, checking, money market, and certificates of deposit.
Provide general account information regarding account balances and transactions performed.
Maintain a balanced cash drawer and observe and report suspicious behavior.
Remain calm and follow procedures in the event of a robbery and provide backup to other employees as needed.
Perform all other required duties as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalency (6 months cash handling experience preferred)
